messages.subject: Rob S photo album
messages.msgSnippet: I was viewing the photo albums and their respective pictures when a particular set of pictures got my attention.... The album belongs to Rob S. and is titled
messages.messageBody:
I was viewing the photo albums and their respective pictures when a
particular set of pictures got my attention.... The album belongs to
Rob S. and is titled 'arrow7us'. The pictures of the tsuba that I want
to know about are Tsuba-2, Tsuba-2---1, and back 2. Rob, tell me all
about this piece.

Thanks,
Elliott
